title: Can You Save the Capture Target From the Main Character’s Clutches? - Novel Updates
tags: Fantasy World   Knights   Multiple Transported Individuals   Oneshot   R-18   Reincarnated in a Game World   Seme Protagonist   Transmigration
author: Yukimi   雪見
description: It was a R-18, BL game that was set in a world with swords and magic. The goal was to win the Knights’ Challenge at the top of the summit, and it seems that I have transmigrated into the devilish character that only appeared to instill trauma in one of the capture targets from Jandel’s route.>
